price: Dia (Zakaria) berkata, "Ya Tuhanku, sungguh tulangku telah melemah dan kepalaku telah dipenuhi uban, sedang aku belum pernah kecewa dalam berdoa kepada-Mu, ya Tuhanku.
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي وَهَنَ ٱلۡعَظۡمُ مِنِّي وَٱشۡتَعَلَ ٱلرَّأۡسُ شَيۡبٗا وَلَمۡ أَكُنۢ بِدُعَآئِكَ رَبِّ شَقِيّٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi innī wahana al-ʿaẓmu minnī wa-ish'taʿala al-rasu shayban walam akun biduʿāika rabbi shaqiyyan
